title: Cremo Bourbon & Oak Cologne Spray, A Sophisticated Blend of Distiller’s Spice, Fine Bourbon and White Oak, 3.4 Oz
description: A sophisticated blend of distiller’s spice, fine bourbon and white oak
Layered and complex scent designed by Cremo’s scent experts
A scent you’d expect to find in a high-end boutique without going to a high-end boutique
